text: :This article is about the baseball player and manager. For the violinist, see Albert Spalding (violinist). Albert Goodwill Spalding (born September 2, 1850 in Byron, Illinois â€“ September 9, 1915 in Point Loma, California) was a professional baseball player, manager and co-founder of A.G.
